block.p: GEMPLUS, Gemenos, France, named Antonio M. Perez president and chief executive. He comes from Hewlett-Packard, where he held the titles of corporate executive vice president, president for the consumer business and digital media solutions, and head of corporate marketing.

GENERAL ELECTRIC CO., Stamford, named Joe Parsons, who led e-business at GE Capital, the finance unit of General Electric, to head its private investment unit, GE Equity. He succeeds Michael Pralle, who was named to lead GE Capital Real Estate, a GE Capital division. Mr. Parsons is succeeded by Mike Stout, who also remains chief investment officer at GE Capital's global consumer finance business.

GEMPLUS, Gemenos, France, named Antonio M. Perez president and chief executive. He comes from Hewlett-Packard, where he held the titles of corporate executive vice president, president for the consumer business and digital media solutions, and head of corporate marketing.

GENERAL ELECTRIC CO., Stamford, named Joe Parsons, who led e-business at GE Capital, the finance unit of General Electric, to head its private investment unit, GE Equity. He succeeds Michael Pralle, who was named to lead GE Capital Real Estate, a GE Capital division. Mr. Parsons is succeeded by Mike Stout, who also remains chief investment officer at GE Capital's global consumer finance business.

TOMMY HILFIGER CORP., Hong Kong, appointed Joel H. Newman, executive vice president for finance and chief administrative officer, to the posts of chief financial officer and administrative officer. He succeeds Benjamin Ng, who is leaving the company.
